plist.dict:
Label kook ProgramArguments
# /Users/INSTALL LOCATION/python.app/Contents/MacOS/python - "INSTALL LOCATION" needs to be replaced for relevant machine #FILENAME.py - "FILENAME" needs to be replace with name of .py file to be run (kookcast.py in this repo)
RunAtLoad
StartCalendarInterval
Hour 9 Minute 45
WorkingDirectory # /Users/USER/FOLDER - "USER" and "FOLDER" need to be replaced for relevant machine
